products.title: Marble, Fresco - Roller Blind
products.metadescription: Marble, fresco - roller blind flint is a colour that's very much in right now, so why not go in search of an original way to introduce it? Marble fresco is their unique take on the problem, and it combines an earthy colour with a subtly shimmering pattern t
products.productdescription: Flint is a colour that's very much in right now, so why not go in search of an original way to introduce it? Marble fresco is their unique take on the problem, and it combines an earthy colour with a subtly shimmering pattern that shines through into the foreground.The interesting thing about fresco is that it enables you to add a calming influence to your room, but still leaves you with plenty of scope to introduce lighter colours. A sandy beige, or even a light hessian would be interesting colours to give some thought to.

products.title: Al Fresco Ember Roman Blind
products.metadescription: Al fresco ember roman blind in grey/brown/multicoloured. Made to measure from 17.59 with free uk mainland delivery. This roman blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
Showing a forest in full bloom. Choose from a softer grey-toned palette to a golden-red to bring nature in to your home.
 
 Product id: db-rom0912 fabric colour: ember material: 100% cotton lining: light filtering poly/cotton blended lining headrail: durable white headrail with top or face fix brackets.   Control type: smooth chain operation - great for a durable, even finish energy saving rating: er2 - medium energy saving value - increase to er3 (high) by adding thermal lining light filtering: yes
